titleStmt.title: Fovrteen sermons preach'd in Lambeth Chapel before the most reverend father in God, Dr. William Sancroft late Lord Archbishop of Canterbury, in the years MDCLXXXVIII, MDCLXXXIX / by the learned Henry Wharton ... ; with an account of the authors life.
titleStmt.author: Wharton, Henry, 1664-1695.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
